title: 5.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a program to find whether the given value of X is present in the sorted list a.
Case 1: If present, return its index.
Case 2: If absent, find the index to insert the value of X into the sorted array. Also,
insert the value into the list and print the updated list.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
